table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

tr.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: The logical name of the element

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

tr.td: Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]

description.value: Metadata elements for a header of medication dispense or dispense decline.

definition.value: Metadata elements for a header of medication dispense or dispense decline.

short.value: Patient who the medication was prescribed to. [Used for searching]
The person who dispensed the product, and takes the responsibility of the dispensation or declining the dispense. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Author by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: The time of recording the dispense or declining the request. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Status of the dispense. In case of declining a dispense, the status should be 'declined'. [Used for searching]
Reason for the current status of dispensation, for example the reason why the dispensation was made invalid

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

short.value: Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]
Metadata elements for a header of medication dispense or dispense decline.

short.value: Patient who the medication was prescribed to. [Used for searching]
The person who dispensed the product, and takes the responsibility of the dispensation or declining the dispense. [Used for searching]
The time of recording the dispense or declining the request. [Used for searching]
Status of the dispense. In case of declining a dispense, the status should be 'declined'. [Used for searching]
Reason for the current status of dispensation, for example the reason why the dispensation was made invalid
Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Business identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]
